name: Verify GET for a Skill with specific ID -- @1.2

steps.name: Given Skills User is on Endpoint: url/Skills with valid username and password
When User sends GET request on skill id from "Skills_GET" and 1
Then skills User validates the StatusCode and StatusMessage from "Skills_GET" sheet and 1 row
And JSON schema is valid for GET with id in Skills
And skills check the Database with Skill id from "Skills_GET" and 1

fullName: To check The GET method for Skills: Verify GET for a Skill with specific ID
